  • Method Details

    • deleteCustomer

      public static boolean deleteCustomer(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a Customer from the SQL Database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - Takes the Customer ID of the Customer to delete.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the deletion successful, false if no Customer deleted due to failure to find ID or other error.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • getCountry

      public static String getCountry(int divisionId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the Country String for the Division ID from the SQL Database. Used to properly format Country ComboBox when a Customer is selected.
      Parameters:
      divisionId - Takes an integer of the Division ID as input.
      Returns:
      Returns a String of the Country associated with the Division ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • getCountryId

      public static int getCountryId(String country) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the Country ID integer from the SQL Database
      Parameters:
      country - Takes the String of the Country Name as input
      Returns:
      Returns an integer of the County ID
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • getCountryList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getCountryList() throws SQLException
      Retrieves the list of countries as an ObservableList from the SQL Database.
      Returns:
      Returns an ObservableList with Strings of the Country names.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • getDivision

      public static String getDivision(int divisionId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the Division Name associated with a Division ID from the SQL Database.
      Parameters:
      divisionId - Takes the Division ID to search as input.
      Returns:
      Returns the Division Name associated with the Division ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • getDivisionId

      public static int getDivisionId(String division) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the Division ID associated with a Division Name from the SQL Database.
      Parameters:
      division - Takes the Division Name to search as Input.
      Returns:
      Returns an integer of the Division ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • getDivisionList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getDivisionList(String country) throws SQLException
      Retrieves an ObservableList of Divisions within a Country from the SQL Database. Uses to update the Division ComboBox when the selected Country changes.
      Parameters:
      country - Takes a Country Name as input.
      Returns:
      Returns an ObservableList of Strings with the Division names.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • insertCustomer

      public static boolean insertCustomer(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Adds a new Customer to the SQL Database.
      Parameters:
      customer - Takes a Customer object as input.
      Returns:
      Returns true if Customer successfully added to Database, false if Customer not added.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • isSafeToDelete

      public static boolean isSafeToDelete(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Checks if Customer has any associated appointments, which determines if a Customer can be deleted.
      Parameters:
      customer - Takes a Customer object as input.
      Returns:
      Returns true if Customer does not have any associated Appointments, false if one or more Appointments for Customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • getCustomerList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getCustomerList() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all Customers in the SQL Database
      Returns:
      Returns an ObservableList of Customers
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • selectDivision

      public static ResultSet selectDivision(int divisionId) throws SQLException
      Returns a ResultSet of a Division record(s). from the SQL Database that match the Division ID input.
      Parameters:
      divisionId - Takes the Division ID to search as input.
      Returns:
      Returns a ResultSet with the matching Division record(s).
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).

    • updateCustomer

      public static boolean updateCustomer(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Updates a Customer Record in the SQL Database with the values of an input Customer object.
      Parameters:
      customer - Takes a Customer object as input
      Returns:
      Returns true if update successful, false if Customer ID not found or Customer unable to update.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception thrown if error in SQL statement or parameter(s).
